entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this evening and developing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
